summary: Add a new video section between the Experience and Contact sections featuring the 'Glass Half Empty' video. The implementation will follow existing design patterns with glass-morphism styling, HTML5 video element with controls, and responsive design. The video section will include a navigation link and integrate seamlessly with the existing portfolio architecture.

action_plan.description: Add navigation link for the video section in the navbar menu between Experience and Contact
Create the video section HTML structure with glass-morphism container, section title, video element with controls, and descriptive text
Add CSS styles for the video section following existing patterns - glass-morphism background, responsive video sizing, hover effects, and mobile responsiveness
Update JavaScript to include video section in scroll animations and navigation functionality
Add custom video controls and play/pause functionality if needed for better user experience
Test responsive behavior across different screen sizes and ensure video doesn't overwhelm the layout

risks: Video file size (16MB) may impact page load performance
Video quality is not HD which may affect visual presentation
Mobile data usage concerns for users on limited data plans
Browser compatibility issues with .mov format on some devices
Potential layout shifts when video loads
Video controls may not match the glass-morphism design aesthetic
dependencies: Video file already exists at static/videos/glass_half_empty.mov
Existing CSS custom properties and design system
Current JavaScript initialization patterns and scroll animations
Existing section structure and navigation system
Mobile responsive grid system already in place
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
